metadata.synopsis: The player observes cave paintings left by primitive tribes of the denizens of the Underdark: driders vs. mind flayers, from when Lolth first descended. Passive History check reveals more information.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: This is Lolth's descent into the Underdark. Looks like her drider champions tearing open some mind flayers.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Looks like a spider... man decapitating a mind flayer. Someone got creative.
